nodes.text: The Armored Whisper was a male Esh-kha savant who was freed from imprisonment in the Tomb on Belsavis during the Galactic War. The Armored Whisper was among the Esh-kha warriors who took over the canyon known as the Scar, but was slain.
The Armored Whisper is the target of the final stage of "The Scar," an Area mission for Imperial players on Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
